cause.description:
Child soldiers in Africa. Poverty orldwide. The AIDS epidemic. Modern-day slavery. Homeless orphans. Grieving widows. Depression. Addiction. Oppression. Shame. Guilt. Violence. Hate. Suffering...
The only force in this world powerful enough to conquer these issues is love. The only people that can give it is us. The only time to do it is now.
www.givelovenow.com
1. Jesus gave us the two greatest commandments: Love God. Love others.
2. God desires to heal the broken.
3. God uses us to change the world.
cause.mission: Inspire people to take action with today's social issues, live out the real cause of Christ, and change the world.
cause.name: Give Love Now
